name: Project Negative
description:
PLEASE READ THIS THE ENTIRE DESCRIPTION BEFORE YOU HAVE ANY EXPECTATIONS FOR THIS GAME

Hey, this is my first upload to Itch.io and it is not actually complete. I no longer have easy access to the code for this project however it is (semi) functional so I figured i'd upload it anyway (also I needed to for a uni assignmet)

Gameplay is simple, you continue going till you die. There is no score system, a bunch of debug stuff is still active and the game isn't very well optimised but it is playable.

Controls:

Up Arrow: Up / Move selection up(menu only)

Down Arrow: Down / Move selection down (menu only)

Left Arrow: Slow Down

Right Arrow: Speed Up

Enter: Activate Selection (menu)

How to Play:

Move your character, hitting black squares and small squares while avoiding everything else. A large wall of death is coming up behind you so don't stop moving.

As has been said, the game was never finished and is unlikely to ever been finished but here it is.

The instructions and options buttons on the menu do not work.

The only way to exit the game is to close the console that opens with it.

Enjoy :)

P.S. If you guys actually like this game I will remake it so that it is functional and works better.

Credits: 

Menu Music from: https://opengameart.org/conten...

Game Music from: https://opengameart.org/conten...

Font: http://www.dafont.com/neuropol...
